subtitle: A cold rice pudding dish flavoured with orange and nutmeg.

method.text: Place rice in a pan with the milk, sugar and nutmeg. Bring to boil and then simmer for 35-45 min, stirring occasionally.
Remove from heat and mix in mixed peel, glace cherries, orange rind and juice, Grand Marnier and egg yolk. Allow to cool completely.

Grease a 600 ml / 1 pt decorative mould and arrange the whole glace cherries in the base. Whisk the egg white until stiff and fold into the cooled rice mixture. Then fold in the cream. Spoon the rice into the mould, cover and freeze for 2 hours.
To serve, let the mousse stand at room temperature for 15-20 min to soften slightly before turning out onto a decorative plate. Decorate with the mint leaves, pecan halves and shredded rind.

title: Frosted rice mousse
